Author: bribear686
Text: I was thinking about it but I don’t want to fuck up my hormones and also I’d be so bad at taking a pill at the same time every day. And I’m afraid of putting the little device thing inside because it might dislodge and stab me. I think I might ec stack and drink caffeine thru my pms

Author: sisterberlin
Text: Have you tried any kind of hormonal birth control? My violent-ass uterus is OUT OF CONTROL without it so I feel u, bruh.  I just stopped taking the pill a few months ago and I’ve been using a period tracking app since then and it’s honestly been fairly accurate so try that too!
